text:
The Most Epic Pool Floats on Amazon (We Want Them All)

Are you ready for summer? Because ready or not, here it comes! While school isn’t out yet, there’s no time like the present to stock up on your summer toys and that includes some new pool floats! Whether you’re looking for fun or function, we’ve rounded up some of the hottest inflatables out there.

Poolcandy Inflatable T-Rex Dinosaur Roar into summer with Pool Candy's newest T-Rex Dinosaur ($34.99). The 48 inch swim ring is great for adults or kids and can hold up to 250 pounds, making it ideal for several kiddos at once.

ADVERTISEMENT

Kangaroo Float's Bacon Pool Raft Sizzle this summer when you're laying out on a seven and a half foot bacon pool float ($15)! Made of heavy duty vinyl, this inflatable will not only have you dreaming of bacon but will be the main source of entertainment at the pool this summer.

Blue Wave Tropical Flip Flop Kick up your heels and chill out on this fun flip flop float ($21). The colorful 71-inch long inflatable has a built in cupholder and headrest and can hold up to 175 pounds.

Poolcandy Giant Glitter Llama Glitter and llamas––what else does your summer need? This whimsical llama pool float ($30) holds up to 250 pounds and contains holographic glitter that changes in the sunlight. Perfect for the river, lake or pool!

Greenco Kids Water Wheel Roller Float Get your kiddos burning off some energy like a little hamster in this colorful water wheel roller float ($26)! Use alone or with a friend––there's no wrong way to enjoy this inflatable.

Zoostliss Party Bird Island Flamingo The entire family can enjoy this party island flamingo float ($229)––at once! The ten feet tall by ten feet wide float can accommodate up to six people at a time and comes with a built-in cup holder and cooler.

Swimline Rosé Pool Float This pool float ($17) brings new meaning to the term, "rosé all day!" The clear, pink, black and gold accented inflatable is all about relaxation and comes with a cup holder––of course.

Swimline Spring Thing It's a float, it's a toy––it's both! Swimline's Spring Thing ($36) is not your typical float but it's definitely something to "spring for" this summer.

Baby Shark Pool Float Baby shark, do, do, do... sorry. This adorable baby shark pool float ($20) comes with a removable canopy, is made from non-toxic materials and is perfect for your little swimmer.

GoFloats Unicorn Party Tube Inflatable Float Take a ride on your favorite magical creature this summer when you buy this GoFloats Unicorn Party Tube ($15), that comes in at a whopping 3 feet tall and 45 inches wide. Fun for everyone, this oversized float is made from thick plastic that will hold up under wear and tear, and comes with a new rapid valve for rapid inflation. Hands down, you'll be the most magical person at the pool this year.

LOL Emoji Pool Float Kids will flip for this fun LOL emoji float ($22), where you can also choose from a variety of expressions like heart eyes, tongue wink and of course, emoji poo. Can you say “☺”?

Inflatable Drink Holders It's summer so that means it's a given to keep cool and hydrated with refreshing drinks. Don't let your drinks get warm by sitting on the hot poolside, bring them in with you! This whimsical pack of inflatable drink holders ($12) is perfect for adults and kids, and is made from high-quality plastic that can hold up to a 15-ounce drink. Fun animals like mermaids, crabs and unicorns as well as pineapples and donuts are all part of this amazing pack of holders that the kids can even use in the tub at home.

Rainbow Cloud Pool Float Enjoy a little shade when you hang out under the rainbow on this rockin' cloud float ($136). Designed with 50 feet of lounge space, you can surely get all the neighborhood kids enjoying this Rainbow Cloud Pool Float in no time. Made with sturdy matte plastic and with rapid valves, you can blow it up using a hand or electric pump, or a hairdryer!

Giant Inflatable Mermaid Tail Pool Float Think about all the Instagram photos you can upload with a magical mermaid float ($20) to call your own.

Water Plane Ride Float with Water Gun Who’s the most popular kid in the neighborhood this summer? The one with one (or two) of these awesome plane floats ($13) in their swimming pool.

Hot Dog Battle Pool Floatie What’s the one thing that can top a chicken fight in the pool? A condiment fight! Kids and adults can battle it our with ketchup and mustard inflatables ($17), on their own hot dog floats.

Inflatable Lounge Mama needs to relax and this inflatable pool lounge is the perfect way to sit back while the kids play. With over 1300 reviews, the Intex King Kool ($8) is an Amazon bestseller and is currently only $5 and part of the Add-On program. Need we say more? The fun colors, armrests and drink holders are just a bonus.

Fireboat Squirter Inflatable Pool Float You probably don’t need to worry about many fires in the swimming pool, but it’s good to know a team of firefighters riding a fireboat squirter float ($40) in on hand just in case.

Supreme Pizza Slice Pool Float Why yes, we will take a slice of pizza to eat on our Supreme Pizza Slice ($22) pool float, thank you very much. The non-slip material means this giant pool float that comes in at 6 feet long by 4.5 feet wide provides plenty of room for adults and kiddos to enjoy in the pool. Cup holders and a "crust" pillow make it pretty comfy, too.

Gigantic Donut Pool Float Take a bite out of blistering summer weather by relaxing in this Gigantic Donut Pool Float by BigMouth ($15). Coming in at over 4 feet wide and printed with UV protection properties, you can enjoy this fade-resistant float for years to come. The colorful float can hold up to 200 pounds and is easy to wipe down and keep clean. YUM!

Canopy Island Inflatable Hand me a drink please, I'll just be over here enjoying myself on this fabulous Canopy Island Inflatable ($70)! This pool float comes with a detachable shade, two cup holders and the fanciest looking backrest so far. Keep cool and collected this summer when you're floating around on one of these!

Smarties Pool Noodle Float How to make a pool party even more fun? Just add candy! The good news is this sweet Smarties pool noodle ($13) will keep the dentist away.

Giant Shark Jaws Inflatable Pool Float You'll never go in the water again… without this awesome Shark Jaws ($30) float that will scare the goggles off of your little ones.

Suntan Tub Float Snag a tan without feeling like you're burning up when you use this Suntan Tub Float ($31). You can keep your entire body in the deep design of this float, without hanging off! Fill with water to keep cool, enjoy the removable pillow or just fill like a baby pool like some reviewers did. Either way, it's a great deal for a large float!

Intex Inflatable Angel Wings A vibrant design and handles make this inflatable angel wings float ($28) both fun and functional. Whether the kids are enjoying a float on the pool, or mama just needs a place to relax, this float gets the job done.

Giant Swan Pool Float If there was ever a place to ride a giant swan ($20), it's in the pool! Able to hold up to 350 pounds and reaching 3 feet in height, you can pile tons of kiddos on this floatie for a great time. A cute design with a rapid inflation valve means you'll be enjoying the pool in no time, and looking adorable while doing it.

Giant Pineapple Pool Party Float Be a pineapple and stand tall when you use this fab Giant Pineapple Pool Party Float ($23)! Bright colors, whimsical design and a huge size makes this the ultimate in pool floats. This perfectly pineapple float may not come with cup holders, but it's a great way to say "hello summer!"

Giant Inflatable Pegasus Pool Float Peggy ($37), as she is known by all her BFFs, has been called, “awesome”, “majestic” and a slew of other superlatives. The most important thing to know about Peggy is that she comes with “rapid valves” for a quick inflate. Phew!

Taco Pool Float This taco float ($12) pairs perfectly with a Corona after you’ve dropped the kids off on a playdate at the neighbor’s house.

––Karly Wood

All photos courtesy of Amazon
